author: cmpilato
msg: Sort the wc-status item= value list, remove duplicate "external"
value I added in r29539, and add the "merged" value.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add missing values to wc-status "item" attribute.
Include "missing" and "external" as possible wc-status item= values.

author: hwright
msg: Merge r29434, r29436, r29438 from trunk:
Copy-on-update can use loggy incorrectly, and possibly lead to dataloss
Notes: although the issue #2986 summary doesn't say so, r29438
actually fixed a dataloss bug (a file could end up with
properties that no one had ever intended to put on it).
r29434 and r29436 are just regression tests for r29438.

author: hwright
msg: This is an incompatible change; it must be backported or reverted.
Dependent on r29269 (nominated above) which removes the last use
